sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function Dashboard({ user, logout }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{/* Header */}
🏦 ExpenseFlow
Welcome, {user?.username || 'User'}!
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome back, {user?.username || 'User'}! 👋

Ready to manage your expenses? Split bills, track spending, and settle up with friends effortlessly.

{/* Dashboard Cards Grid */}
{/* Groups Card */}
navigate('/groups')}> 👥

Manage Groups

Create trip groups, add members, and organize your expenses

{/* Expenses Card */}
navigate('/expenses')}> 💰

Track Expenses

Add expenses, split bills, and see who owes what

{/* Analytics Card */}
navigate('/analytics')}> 📊

View Analytics

See spending patterns, individual contributions, and category breakdowns

{/* Settlement Tracking Card */}
navigate('/settlements')}> 🧾

Settlement Tracking

Track who owes what and record payments between group members

{/* Khata Book Card */}
navigate('/khatabook')}> 📚

Khata Book

View complete transaction history and ledger for all groups

{/* Personal Khata Card */}
navigate('/personal-khata')}> 📔

Personal Khata

Manage your personal customers and track outstanding amounts

{/* Quick Start Guide */}

🚀 Quick Start Guide

{/* Step 1 */}
navigate('/groups')} >
👥

1. Create a Group

Start by creating a trip or event group

{/* Step 2 */}
navigate('/groups')} >
✉️

2. Add Members

Invite friends by their email addresses

{/* Step 3 */}
navigate('/expenses')} >
💰

3. Add Expenses

Record expenses and they'll be split automatically

{/* Step 4 */}
navigate('/settlements')} >
🧾

4. Settle Up

See who owes what and settle balances

); } export default Dashboard;
